main event: A civilian observed an unidentified flying object resembling a pattern of lights on 3 May 65.
interesting points: The object was visible for about 4 minutes before disappearing slowly,The object had 4-5 lights that blinked on and off in succession,The object changed color from silver to reddish orange,The observation was made using binoculars from a 40 degree elevation,The sighting occurred near two bright stars in clear weather conditions.
sighted object: a round, star-like object with blinking lights
witness description: Mr. Ehneridge, a self-employed civilian from Chesapeake, Virginia
